Uses of Package
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils

Packages that use com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils
com.ibm.zrl.credsystem.utils Package contains classes that extend several classes from the Idemix anonymous credential system. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm This package contains the data model abstractions appearing in the various protocol roles such as credentials, attributes, or commitments. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.key This package contains the code to implement the Idemix key support. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof This package contains the code to implement the Idemix proving protocol. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.ip This package contains the code to implement the inequality proofs. 
com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils This package contains various utilities, such as the parser and the serializer, used throughout the Idemix library. 
 

Classes in com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils used by com.ibm.zrl.credsystem.utils
Constants
          Constants that are used in various places and information (such as the version of the library).
Parser
          Parsing class, which allows to load XML files specifying things such as issuer keys, credential structures or proof specifications.
Utils
          Set of utilities routines used throughout the library.
XMLSerializer
          Class for object serialization to XML.
 

Classes in com.ibm.zrl.idmx.utils used by com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm

          Idemix group parameters abstraction.
SystemParameters
          Idemix system parameters.
